page.title: 06INDUSTRY
page.content: IN NORTHFIELD THERE IS VERY LITTLE INDUSTRY BECAUSE IT IS MAINLY A RESIDENTIAL AREA MADE UP OF A SERIES OF ESTATES BOTH PRIVATE AND LOCA AUTHOR- ITY.ON THE EDGE OF THE AREA TRIPLEX HAVE A FACTORY MAKING GLASS PRODUCTS BUT MOST INDUSTRIAL WORKERS ARE EMPLOY ED OUTSIDE THE AREA.SOME WORK AT THE AUSTIN ROVER GROUP FACTORY IN LONGBRIDGE WHERE CARS ARE MADE.OTHERS WORK NEARBY AT KALAMAZOO. CADBURY'S CHOCOLATE FACTORY IS ANOTHER LARGE EMPLOYER IN BOURNVILLE. NORTHFIELD ALSO HAS VERY GOOD TRANSPORT FACILITIES BECAUSE WE HAVE A MAIN ROAD THE A38 CALLED THE BRISTOL ROAD SOUTH ENABLING PEOPLE TO TRAVEL TO OTHER PARTS OF THE CITY TO WORK.
